mapper.select: SELECT menu_code menuCode, parent_code parentCode, menu_name menuName, web_code webCode, menu_url menuUrl, icon icon, menu_sort menuSort, menu_type menuType, perms perms, enable enable, create_time createTime FROM portal_menu ORDER BY menu_sort

SELECT menu_code menuCode, parent_code parentCode, menu_name menuName, web_code webCode, menu_url menuUrl, icon icon, menu_sort menuSort, menu_type menuType, perms perms, enable enable, create_time createTime FROM portal_menu WHERE menu_code = #{menuCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO portal_menu ( menu_code, parent_code, menu_name, web_code, menu_url, icon, menu_sort, menu_type, perms, enable, create_id, create_time ) VALUES ( #{menuCode}, #{parentCode}, #{menuName}, #{webCode}, #{menuUrl}, #{icon}, #{menuSort}, #{menuType.value}, #{perms}, #{enable.value}, #{createId}, #{createTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE portal_menu SET parent_code = #{parentCode}, menu_name = #{menuName}, web_code = #{webCode}, menu_url = #{menuUrl}, icon = #{icon}, menu_sort = #{menuSort}, menu_type = #{menuType.value}, perms = #{perms}, update_id = #{updateId}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE menu_code = #{menuCode}
UPDATE portal_menu SET enable = '1' WHERE menu_code = #{menuCode}
UPDATE portal_menu SET enable = '0' WHERE menu_code = #{menuCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT portal_role_menu ( role_menu_id, role_id, menu_code, create_id, create_time ) VALUES ( #{roleMenuId}, #{roleId}, #{menuCode}, #{createId}, #{createTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT menu.menu_code menuCode, menu.parent_code parentCode, menu.menu_name menuName, menu.web_code webCode, menu.menu_url menuUrl, menu.icon icon, menu.menu_sort menuSort, menu.menu_type menuType, menu.perms perms, menu.enable enable, menu.create_time createTime FROM portal_menu menu LEFT JOIN portal_role_menu roleMenu ON menu.menu_code = roleMenu.menu_code WHERE roleMenu.role_id = #{roleId}

SELECT menu.menu_code menuCode, menu.parent_code parentCode, menu.menu_name menuName, menu.web_code webCode, menu.menu_url menuUrl, menu.icon icon, menu.menu_sort menuSort, menu.menu_type menuType, menu.perms perms, menu.enable enable, menu.create_time createTime FROM portal_menu menu

SELECT menu.menu_code menuCode, menu.parent_code parentCode, menu.menu_name menuName, menu.web_code webCode, menu.menu_url menuUrl, menu.icon icon, menu.menu_sort menuSort, menu.menu_type menuType, menu.perms perms, menu.enable enable, menu.create_time createTime FROM portal_menu menu LEFT JOIN portal_role_menu roleMenu ON menu.menu_code = roleMenu.menu_code LEFT JOIN portal_role role ON role.role_id = roleMenu.role_id LEFT JOIN portal_user_role userRole ON userRole.role_id = role.role_id WHERE userRole.user_id = #{userId}
